content: the singing sea blanket is crocheted in row back and forth and to get the striped effect you crochet two rounds with each color the clever thing is that you don t have to cut the yarn when changing colors how to do it is described in the pattern i chosed to use three different colors for my blanket but two or five colors work great as well take a look inside your yarn box and see what you can combine together my blanket is a children s blanket with the dimensions 65 x 95 cm but you can easily change the dimensions to your needs which is also described in the pattern ❀ ❀ ❀ **stitches used in this pattern ** chain slip_stitch single_crochet and double_crochet ❀ ❀ ❀ **join my facebook group ** my facebook group mijo crochet hangout is a social group where you can get support and be inspired by other fellow crocheters welcome https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout/ ❀ ❀ ❀ this pattern have been fully tested thank you heike berg for your work and feedback with this pattern ❀ ❀ ❀
